name: UrmetAssistant
0:
”Alexa, Arm Alarm”
”Alexa, Disarm Alarm”
”Alexa, Show Intercom Camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa you can easily control and interact with the new compatible Urmet systems

For example, you can arm/disarm your Urmet Burglar Alarm System or answer a video door entry call, wherever you are, using your voice

Currently, the compatible products are:

BURGLAR ALARM SYSTEM
 - Urmet 1068 range

VIDEO DOOR PHONE RANGE
 - Urmet 1760 intercom range

How to use the skill:
1. Install an Urmet compatible device and configure it by referring to the instructions on www.urmet.it
2. Download the UrmetSecure app (for anti-intrusion products) or Urmet CallMe (for video-intercom products) to complete the
 user registration by associating the previously installed and configured Urmet device to your profile
3. Enable the Urmet Assistant skill
4. Log in with the account using the credentials registered in step2
5. Search for devices using Alexa App
6. Enjoy your device using Alexa voice commands.
